description:
✂  Tools & Supplies I Recommend: https://goo.gl/Y7KKhY
$  Join the "Fellowship" on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf

In this episode I discuss the differences between the Shifting Lands Guider Pro and Guider Pro 2.0. I also show how to assemble the Guider Pro 2.0, using some tricks that will ensure it is put together correctly.

You can purchase the Guider Pro 2.0 and many other great Proxxon tools and accessories for foam craft at http://www.shiftinglands.com


➳  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca

➳ Facebook: https://goo.gl/hvNgQL

➳ Join the Tabletop Crafters Guild: https://goo.gl/RMMqoh















Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
tags: how to assemble shifting lands guider pro
title: How to Assemble Shifting Lands Guider Pro 2.0 (Black Magic Craft Episode 073)
